name: Word Challenge - Set 1
description:
Test your knowledge of 60 different vocabulary words. Some are common and some not.  The are five screens containing twelve words on each screen. A definition appears at the bottom of the screen and the player has to choose the correct matching term. The positions of the terms are shuffled and the defintions are presented in a random order. All levels are of the same difficulty being appropriate for high school and college students.  A correct answer earns the player 150 points. Using a HINT will deduct 75 points from the score and reveal the answer.  A wrong answer deducts 50 points from the score. The score cannot fall below zero. A TIMER  provides an additional opportunity for competitions. A list of all the terms, definitions, and a sample question is  accessible for study of each level. There is a report at the end of the game which shows the score and time for each of the completed levels. The game can be muted from the front screen or you can use the volume controls on your Android device.

    This game should work on Android versions 5.0 and higher.  The game does not ask for any permissions and does not access the internet. There are no ads in the game and it does not collect any personal information. It is being provided for free to the Android community. 
The Windows version will run fine on Windows 7.0 through 10.0.
Visit https://sites.google.com/view/rtcgames/home for more FREE games.
